00090         protected function getCheckFailed($check) {
00091                 $checkFailed = $check['check'];
00092                 if(is_array($check['params'])) {
00093                         $checkFailed .= ";";
00094                         foreach($check['params'] as $key=>$value) {
00095                                 $checkFailed .= $key."::".$value.";";
00096                         }
00097                         $checkFailed = substr($checkFailed,0,strlen($checkFailed)-1);
00098                 }
00099                 return $checkFailed;
00100         }
00101         
00109         protected function getCheckValue($obj,$params) {
00110                 $checkValue = $obj;
00111                 if(is_array($params)) {
00112                         $checkValue = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($obj,$params);
00113                 }
00114                 return $checkValue;
00115         }
